testcase.name: Failing test example
testcase.failure:
Scenario: Failing test example
Then the "missing_confirm_password_error" on the Create Account Page should be visible and say "Type your name again"
Message:
Expected: 'Type your name again' Actual: 'Type your password again' (RuntimeError) ./features/step_definitions/example_steps.rb:32:in `/^the "(.*)" on the (.*) should be visible and say "(.*)"$/' features/example.feature:53:in `Then the "missing_confirm_password_error" on the Create Account Page should be visible and say "Type your name again"'
